message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $120. This is an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable item worth more than what you're willing to pay.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your offer, but I need to maintain a fair profit margin. Therefore, I propose a price of $110 for the product.
